document_data.mainbody:
Igrayne Elonis was an elven priest of Mystra in the 14 and 15 centuries DR.
She had light skin, gray eyes, and short backswept white hair. She favored a simple dress with a low-cut bodice.
Igrayne was once a priestess of Mystra, but after her goddesss death in 1385 DR she was left aimless. Around the time of the Sschindylryn invasion of Eveningstar during the Darkening of 1484â€“1485 DR, Igrayne lived in Eveningstar, though still despondent. She could be seen standing on a small cliff near the village, pondering her existence.
